refnamediv.refpurpose: Trace element, allowing user to give feedback about errors encountered during SimulinkImport

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Although trying to make Simulink Import as mistakeless as possible there is high possibility of encountering some problems during translation od Simulink Diagram (especially complicated once). In order to give user chance to easily correct badly translated diagrams, Simulink Import gives user an extensive translation trace, and generates simple report containing information about missing compatibility patterns and blocks that translation were not succesfull.

refsection.title: Example
refsection.programlisting: [TRACE] TraceElement - Missing compatibility patterns for 2 blocks: [TRACE] TraceElement - Saturate [TRACE] TraceElement - Math [TRACE] TraceElement - Errors encountered when translating 10 blocks [TRACE] TraceElement - sqrt(2/3) rpar: NumberFormaException from:sqrt(2/3) with: 2 3 [TRACE] TraceElement - sqrt(2)/2 rpar: NumberFormaException from:sqrt(2)/2 with: 2 2 [TRACE] TraceElement - 1/sqrt(6) rpar: NumberFormaException from:1/sqrt(6) with: 1 6 [TRACE] TraceElement - sqrt(2/3) rpar: NumberFormaException from:sqrt(2/3) with: 2 3 [TRACE] TraceElement - sqrt(2)/2 rpar: NumberFormaException from:sqrt(2)/2 with: 2 2 [TRACE] TraceElement - Gain4 rpar: NumberFormaException from:k*Rr with: [TRACE] TraceElement - Gain6 rpar: NumberFormaException from:k with: [TRACE] TraceElement - Gain5 rpar: NumberFormaException from:k*Rr with: [TRACE] TraceElement - Gain1 rpar: NumberFormaException from:k with: [TRACE] TraceElement - pxpsid0 rpar: NumberFormaException from:k*p with:
